Even in truck mode, Tucson could hear Talon's scream of pain.  And that was=
 enough to energize him just enough to get him to roll quickly toward Talon=
, as he opens his cab doors right beside her.

"Night Shift, get - Talon in=
to my cab, now!"

Night Shift is quick to follow orders, as he carefully pl=
aces Talon on Tucson's front seat.  Tucson shuts his doors and secures her =
gently so she doesn't fall when he moves.  It was just enough energy to sec=
ure her, as his engine slows and once again, is idol.

"Talon - I want you =
to - know that it will take more than just a shot - to my arm to stop me co=
mpletely.  Hydras will pay for what - he has done to you.  I promise you th=
at."

Night Shift looks over to Kup.

"Kup, I need help, we gotta towe Tucs=
on outa here.  See if we got anyone else around ta lend us a hand.  Now tha=
t he's on wheels, it'll be easier ta get 'em outa here."

Inside the black =
fortress, Rat Trap continues to guide Wind Lord to the exit, and points to =
it as he reaches the final leg of the hairy journey.

"There it is!  Okay W=
indlord, I'm gonna need a ride again, and I promise I will so make this up =
ta ya when this whole thing's over with."
